original_text: Even as the words were on his lips, a voice came from heaven, “This is what is decreed for you, King Nebuchadnezzar: Your royal authority has been taken from you.
korean_text: 이 말이 아직도 나 왕의 입에 있을 때에 하늘에서 소리가 내려 이르되 느부갓네살 왕아 네게 말하노니 나라의 왕위가 네게서 떠났느니라

sentences.original_text: Even as the words were on his lips
"This is what is decreed for you
Your royal authority has been taken from you.
